name: Space Warriors: Duel
description:
Feel yourself a member of the closed space fight club.

Fights (battles) - the basis of the gameplay.

The battle consists of a consistent exchange of blows between two rivals. During the exchange, players are given a choice between the hit and block zones. Zones are the head, body and legs.

In combat, there is the possibility of using various techniques that become available for successfully conducted attacks.

Dueling takes place in one of several unique in appearance places.

The game features 3 classes of characters. Each fighter has his own special techniques (ways of attack and defense).

The opportunity to participate in the tournament with many strong and powerful soldiers.

Become stronger raising the level of your character and his unique hits. Beautiful graphics in the style of Flat. Brutal effects, music and sounds. Easy to learn
